body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Car Deals Inc. My name is Steven Perry, how may I assist you today? May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Crystal. What seems to be the issue you are facing with the product quality today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I recently purchased a car from your dealership, but I've noticed some strange noises coming from the engine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Crystal. Can you provide me with the Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) of the car? We will look into this matter for you.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, the VIN number is five zero six eight nine two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Crystal. Additionally, may I have your phone number so we can easily update you on the progress of the investigation?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my phone number is nine eight seven six five four three two one zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Crystal. We will investigate the issue with the car and be in touch with you soon. Thank you for reaching out to us today.
